subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The father of the Arkansas star running back Darren McFadden denied a report that he has sent paperwork to the N.F.L. so his son can enter the upcoming draft.ESPN.com, citing unidentified sources, reported that the father, Graylon McFadden, provided the relevant paperwork early this week.“I hate to be saying anything because all these false stories and everything are floating around,” Graylon McFadden told The Associated Press on Saturday. “But no, I didn’t — and that’s all I’ve got to say.”.
